tool_description: Create a no-hassle mailing utility without putting much effort
name: Mailer
title: Mailer

api_list.name: NewRequest
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mailer6.p.rapidapi.com/v1/mailer"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mailer6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mailer6.p.rapidapi.com/v1/mailer"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mailer6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
